page.title: 11EDUCATION:CARMEL COLLEGE
page.content: {Carmel College}is a Jewish boarding school with some day pupils.It is co- educational.Itwas founded in 1948 by Rabbi Kopul Rosen,who wished to combine the tradition of the English public school with the Jewish ethos.The school moved to Mongewell Park from its original home near Newbury in 1953.The Manor of Mongewell appears in the original Domesday Book.Philosophy:while aiming at a high level of general {education},Carmel also presents as total a picture as possible of Jewish denominational sector.Although most pupils do not come from committed backgrounds,Carmel feels it important that they know what it means to be Jewish.
